## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Clinical algorithm (new or updated scoring system)
- [ ] ML model (new or updated model)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would break existing functionality)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Infrastructure / DevOps
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)

## Clinical Algorithms

<!-- If this PR adds or modifies a clinical algorithm, complete this section. Otherwise, delete it. -->

- [ ] Algorithm cites a peer-reviewed source in code comments
- [ ] Scoring criteria match the published literature exactly
- [ ] Tests use known clinical outcomes for validation
- [ ] Algorithm is documented in `docs/ALGORITHMS.md`

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] My code follows the TypeScript strict mode conventions of this project
- [ ] I have added tests that cover my changes
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass (`npm run test`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`npx tsc --noEmit`)
- [ ] I have not included any real patient data, credentials, or secrets
